prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
The information was presented by Standa, who is responsible for online activities at Korálky Katlas. More information about him can be found at stanislavvavrik.cz.

---

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Standa, online activities, Korálky Katlas, stanislavvavrik.cz
